titleStmt.title: Pyretologia, a rational account of the cause & cure of agues with their signes diagnostick & prognostick. Also some specifick medicines prescribed for the cure of all sorts of agues; with an account of a successful method of the authors for the cure of the most tedious and dangerous quartans. Likewise some observations of cures performed by the aforesaid method. Whereunto is added a short account of the cause and cure of feavers, and the griping in the guts, agreeable to nature's rules and method of healing. Authore Rto Talbor pyretiatro.
titleStmt.author: Talbor, Robert, Sir, 1642-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Robinson, and are to be sold at his shop near Greys-Inne Gate in Holborn,

notesStmt.note: The first word of the title has been transliterated from the Greek.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop near Greys-Inne Gate in Holborn
